name: Eden Care
headline: Digital health insurance for employers in Africa
description:
Eden Care is building a digital health insurer for employers in Africa. 

Today, health insurance operation costs in Africa are 2.2x the global average. Eden Care is cutting this by 43% making health insurance cheaper. 

The $11Bn African health insurance market is projected to grow to $72Bn in just  12 years. We are targeting 90 million uninsured African employees.

founders.name: Moses Mukundi, Founder
founders.description: I founded my first startup, an agritech startup,  at 23 that scaled to profitability and was acquired in 2017. I spent 6 years in the insurance and healthcare verticals in Africa before pursuing my MBA at Wharton Business School.

# Welcome to healthier, happier health insurance
We’ve re-imagined health insurance from the ground up to offer a digital-based experience with a focus on prevention—one that works to save both time and money. See what that means for you.
[Learn More about Group Coverage![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)](https://www.edencaremedical.com/</products/health-insurance>)
![Picture of the author](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhero-desktop.463b509b.png&w=1920&q=75)
Trusted by more than 23,000+ Lives

![KFW Bank logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/kfw.png)![Three Stones logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/three-stones.jpg)![One Acre Fund logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/one-acre-fund.jpg)![Carnegie Mellon University logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/carnegie-melon.jpg)![Gasmeth Energy logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/gasmeth.jpg)![Chancen International logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/chancen.jpg)![Radisson Hotel logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/radisson-logo.png)![Vuba Vuba logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/vubavuba.jpg)![Never Again Rwanda logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/never-again.png)![Ballistic logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/ballistic.jpeg)![African Leadership University logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/alu.png)![Foundation logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/foundation.png)![Toyota Rwanda logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/toyota-rwanda.jpg)![Singita logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/singita.jpg)![GardaWorld logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/gardaworld.jpg)![Unguka Bank logo](https://www.edencaremedical.com/unguka.jpg)
Your Path to a Healthier Life
THE EDEN CARE WAY
Our insurance and wellness products incentivize members to take charge of their health and care needs via our hassle-free, paperwork-free app. Customers and partners love our healthier way of working. Think 100% digital signups, online customer quotes in minutes, and partner payments sent on a schedule customized for each practice. That’s just for starters
Join the community![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2FjoinCommunity-1.png&w=3840&q=75)
Human ingenuity and integrated, full-stack technology keep the focus on what matters most: health and happiness for the entire Eden Care Community.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2FjoinCommunity-2.png&w=3840&q=75)
Incentivizes and rewards members to keep tabs on their mental and physical health and take steps to improve their wellbeing.
Join the community![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)
Our community
A better experience for everyone
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/swipe-tab-icon-1.png)Employer groups
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/swipe-tab-icon-2.png)Members and Dependents
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/swipe-tab-icon-Active-3.png)Partners

# Better for members. Better for you.
From paper-free online signup and management to customized plans and processes, we’ve spent a lot of time designing how we work to save you time and hassle.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-shield-minimalistic.png)
Real time support
We are just a call or message away 24/7, ready to offer guidance and resolve any issues that may arise.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-profile.png)
Enhanced Employee Wellbeing
Our ProActiv health and wellness programs work to improve employees' mental and physical wellbeing for increased productivity and reduced absenteeism.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-Checklist-minimalistic.png)
Customized Plans
We don’t offer packages. We offer plans put together around your employees’ specific needs and the wishes you have for your insurance offering.
[Explore Group Health Insurance![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)](https://www.edencaremedical.com/</clients/employer-groups>)
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcard-img-1.png&w=3840&q=75)![Group Health Insurance](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-img-mob-1.png)
# Get ready to love your health insurance
From helping you find a provider and set up an appointment right within our app, to online bill submission, to wellness coaching and proactive testing, we make being as healthy and happy as you can be as easy as it can be.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-benefits-icon-1.png)
650+ Trusted Providers
We’ve curated a network of trusted healthcare professionals and wellness experts, the best in their respective fields, so you can feel confident in the care you receive.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-benefits-icon-2.png)
Rewarding Healthy Habits
Your dedication to healthy habits matters to us. Your reward? Fun treats like free healthy meals, smoothies, or coffee.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-benefits-icon-3.png)
Paperless billing
Like finding a provider and setting up appointments, our billing is digital too. Unless you prefer paper, of course. We work that way too.
[Learn About Member Benefits![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)](https://www.edencaremedical.com/</clients/members-and-dependents>)
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcard-img-2.png&w=3840&q=75)![Group Health Insurance](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-img-mob-2.png)
Clinical Partners
ProActiv Partners
# Payment on your schedule. Paper-free.
We work hard to make working with us easier at every turn. Our goal is to enable you provide fantastic care without the headaches and hassles typically associated with the backend of insurance.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/payment-card-1.png)
Online service portal
Say goodbye to paper—and hello to efficiency. Easily manage health records and billing through our intuitive online portal.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/payment-card-2.png)
Payment on your schedule
Whatever works with your books and internal processes—within a few days of treatment, weekly, or monthly—we’ll pay you that way.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/payment-card-3.png)
Support when you need it
Our crack customer support team is here early in the morning and late into the night, to help you get answers or sort out any issues.
[Partner with Eden Care![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)](https://www.edencaremedical.com/</partners/clinical>)
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcard-img-3-a.png&w=3840&q=75)![Group Health Insurance](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-img-mob-3-a.png)
# Better for members. Better for you.
From paper-free online signup and management to customized plans and processes, we’ve spent a lot of time designing how we work to save you time and hassle.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/quick-notes-icon.png)
Quick customer quotes
Simply fill in a form online and we’ll get you a quote in less than 5 min that is ready to go straight to the customer and is customized to their wants and needs.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/digital-everywhere.png)
Simple online portal
Our ProActiv health and wellness programs work to improve employees' mental and physical wellbeing for increased productivity and reduced absenteeism.
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/partners-icon-3.png)
Support when you need it
If you’re working, we are too. Help is available via phone, email, or text message from early mornings to (very) late at night.
[Explore Partnership Opportunities![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)](https://www.edencaremedical.com/</partners/brokers-and-agents>)
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcard-img-4.png&w=3840&q=75)![Group Health Insurance](https://www.edencaremedical.com/card-img-mob-4.png)
SUPERIOR SERVICE
Patients vs patience
A dedicated team that’s up-to-speed on all things you, means no patience is needed. We get you answers fast to keep the focus on getting our members the best care.
## Eden’s Care Team
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/service-active-1.png)
### Fast responses
Connect to a real person via our web chat or phone or email us. We’re here to help
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/service-active-2.png)
### Billing
Have a question? We’re here to sort out anything that doesn’t look right
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/service-active-3.png)
### Get answers
With the latest on your specific plan and situation via our digital portal and above-and-beyond training, our team gets you solid, actionable answers
## Typical Service
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/service-1.png)
### Please hold...
You wait. And wait. And then get transferred to an automated phone service or polite, but uninformed, agent
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/service-2.png)
### Billing hiccups
You’re the one having to reach out to multiple entities to get clarity, and correction on a bill mishap
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/service-3.png)
### You're on your own
Whether you’re a member needing to find a provider, an employer or partner needing to sort out a concern or a mix up, you’re on the hook to figure it out
Get started![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/link-arrow.png)
![](https://www.edencaremedical.com/star-flower-icon.png)
We have a different approach to customer service

generated_description:
### Eden Care: Redefining Health Insurance in Africa

**Website**: [Eden Care](https://www.edencaremedical.com)  
**Founded**: 2021  
**Location**: Nairobi, Kenya  
**Team Size**: 28 employees  
**Y Combinator**: Part of Batch S23  
**Group Partner**: Tom Blomfield  

#### Mission
Eden Care is on a mission to revolutionize health insurance for employers across Africa with a digital-first approach. They aim to make health insurance not only efficient but significantly more affordable.

#### The Problem
Health insurance costs in Africa are about 2.2 times the global average—this is a staggering statistic when you consider the need for affordable healthcare solutions. Eden Care is determined to cut these costs by 43%, allowing businesses to provide coverage for their employees without breaking the bank.

#### Market Potential
The African health insurance market stands at $11 billion and is projected to skyrocket to $72 billion in the next 12 years. Eden Care is focusing on the untapped pool of 90 million uninsured employees, presenting both a challenge and a massive opportunity.

#### Innovative Solutions
Eden Care's platform offers a completely digital experience designed for efficiency and user-friendliness:
- **Paperless Processes**: 100% digital signups and hassle-free management.
- **Real-time Support**: Available via phone and messaging 24/7.
- **Customized Plans**: No one-size-fits-all; plans are tailored to the specific needs of employers and their employees.
- **ProActive Wellness Programs**: Focus on preventative care, incentivizing users to maintain their health.

#### Customer Base
Eden Care already has a proven track record, serving over 23,000 lives. They are backed by both businesses and educational institutions, including KFW Bank, Carnegie Mellon University, and Radisson Hotels, which highlights their credibility and appeal in the marketplace.

#### Why It Matters
Eden Care isn’t just selling insurance—they’re creating a new narrative around health coverage in Africa. By shifting from traditional insurance paradigms to a digital model that emphasizes wellness, they’re poised to improve the overall health of the workforce while reducing costs for companies. This approach reflects a broader trend toward digital health solutions that recognize the importance of tech in enhancing service delivery.

In summary, Eden Care is more than an insurance provider; it’s a catalyst for change in the African health insurance landscape. They’re tapping into a massive market need with innovative solutions that could set a new standard for how health insurance operates in the region.
